trans-unit.source: Wraps an XSD <xref uid="langword_csharp_gMonth" name="gMonth" href=""></xref> type.
For more information about XSD data types, see the "XML Data Types Reference" in the MSDN Library at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapMonth"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapMonth"></xref> class with a specified <xref:System.DateTime> object.
A <xref:System.DateTime> object to initialize the current instance.
Returns the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
Converts the specified <xref:System.String> into a <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapMonth"></xref> object.
The Parse method is capable of parsing strings in various formats.
The recognizable string formats are composed out of the following format patterns.
|Format Pattern|Description|Examples| |--------------------|-----------------|--------------| |MM|The numeric month.
Single-digit months have a leading zero.|11, 05| |zzz|The full time zone offset (hour and minutes) from the Universal Time Coordinate (Greenwich Mean Time).
Single-digit hours have a leading zero.|-07:00, 08:00|
The <xref uid="langword_csharp_String" name="String" href=""></xref> to convert.
A object that is obtained from value.
value does not contain a date and time that corresponds to any of the recognized format patterns.
Returns <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapMonth.Value*> as a <xref:System.String>.
A <xref:System.String> that is obtained from <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Metadata.W3cXsd2001.SoapMonth.Value*> in the format "--MM--".
Gets or sets the date and time of the current instance.
The <xref:System.DateTime> object that contains the date and time of the current instance.
Gets the XML Schema definition language (XSD) of the current SOAP type.
A <xref:System.String> that indicates the XSD of the current SOAP type.
